name: pin-unpin-tab
description: Pin or unpin a tab through the toolbar icon, or a keyboard shortcut, or a left long-click anywhere on the page.
author: Jayesh Bhoot

scripts.build: mel build && esbuild bg.bs.js --bundle --outfile=bg.prod.js && esbuild long_click.bs.js --bundle --outfile=long_click.prod.js && esbuild prefs.bs.js --bundle --outfile=prefs.prod.js
